menu

Class FriendMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.FriendMenu

  • public class FriendMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    The FriendMenu class represents the menu class for function "Accept", "Unfriend", "Request" and "Reject".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FriendMenu()
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept(Farmer f, java.lang.String choice)
      This method will display the information when user accepts friends request.
      void display(Farmer f)
      This method will display the My Friend menu.
      void displayFriends(Farmer f)
      This method will display the list of friends' username.
      void displayRequests(Farmer f)
      This method will display the list of requests' username.
      int extractInt(java.lang.String choice)
      This method will extract an integer from a string and return the integer.
      void reject(Farmer f, java.lang.String choice)
      This method will display the information when user rejects friend request.
      void sendRequest(Farmer f)
      This method will display the information when user sends a friend request.
      void unfriend(Farmer f, java.lang.String choice)
      This method will display the information when user unfriends with other users.

        public int extractInt(java.lang.String choice)
        This method will extract an integer from a string and return the integer.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the integer extracted from the string if the input is in correct format; -1 if the input is invalid.

        choice - the input the user entered when choosing "Unfriend".
